issue.title: [Developer] Achery benchmark diff regression: cannot compare jsons
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-11944](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11944). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
see also ARROW-11189

`archery benchmark diff` should accept json files containing cached results from `archery benchmark run`.

A test should be added exercising this case and doc added to benchmarks.rst

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-11944?focusedCommentId=17301891) by Ben Kietzman (bkietz):*
Issue resolved by pull request 9712
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/9712>
